Description:
On the side of the mountain you find a small bazaar that seems to be specialized in articles related to fire.

Taking a first look you see very interesting articles but it gives you the feeling that they are going to overcharge you for them.

You could try to bargain so that at least the price is right.
DescriptionAction: It's time to do some shopping!
